isCached

protected boolean isCached(ItemId id)
Checks if there's already a corresponding cache entry for id.

Parameters:
id - id of a ItemState object
Returns:
true if there's a corresponding cache entry, otherwise false.

retrieve

protected ItemState retrieve(ItemId id)
Returns an item-state reference from the cache.

Parameters:
id - the id of the ItemState object whose reference should be retrieved from the cache.
Returns:
the ItemState reference stored in the corresponding cache entry or null if there's no corresponding cache entry.

cache

protected void cache(ItemState state)
Puts the reference to an ItemState object in the cache using its path as the key.

Parameters:
state - the ItemState object to cache

evict

protected void evict(ItemId id)
Removes a cache entry for a specific id.

Parameters:
id - the id of the ItemState object whose reference should be removed from the cache.

evictAll

protected void evictAll()
Clears all entries from the cache.

isEmpty

protected boolean isEmpty()
Returns true if the cache contains no entries.

Returns:
true if the cache contains no entries.

size

protected int size()
Returns the number of entries in the cache.

Returns:
number of entries in the cache.

keys

protected Iterator keys()
Returns an iterator of the keys (i.e. ItemId objects) of the cached entries.

Returns:
an iterator of the keys of the cached entries.

entries

protected Iterator entries()
Returns an iterator of the entries (i.e. ItemState objects) in the cache.

Returns:
an iterator of the entries in the cache.
